snippet: Paul McCartney announced that his new album of pop standards will be titled "Kisses on the Bottom." We'll give you a moment to contemplate that. Ready to continue? O.K.
abstract: Paul McCartney announced that his new album of pop standards will be titled "Kisses on the Bottom." We'll give you a moment to contemplate that. Ready to continue? O.K.

headline.main: A Saucy Album Title Isn't Beneath Paul McCartney
headline.print_headline: A Saucy Album Title Isn’t Beneath McCartney
